for_sales.sales_text: Slate grey Bayraider 20 by Swallow Yachts. Fast, stable (see videos on internet) shallow draft, Gunter ketch. Wooden main mast and boom, carbon gaff and mizzen. Additional cut-down carbon gaff and main. Compass. 4 stroke Yamaha in well. Anchor, chain and rode, fenders, warps. Overall and mooring covers. Road trailer serviced. New tyres. Antifouled. Lying Bury St Edmunds.

boat.full_description:
Leven Lady is a slate grey Bayraider 20 which is one of a series of GRP boats produced by Swallow Yachts in Cardiff. Ketch rigged, she has a hollow wooden mast with wood main, mizzen and fore booms. The mizzen and gaff are carbon fibre. An assymetric spinnaker can be flown from a retracting carbon pole.

The unique feature of the Bayraider is the ability to fill bilge tanks with water, providing immense stability when required while preserving great speed with empty tanks for the more experienced.

The boat is easy to trail, launch and recover with an active owner's association organising rallies throughout Britain.
boat.name: Leven Lady
boat.short_description: An attractive production GRP gunter ketch with water ballast.
